Looking for DevOps Engineers? Let them know you're hiring here! Posts must include position details, location(s)/remote, and employer details. Only DevOps & Sysadmin Roles posted in #-job-opportunities. Keep job postings relevant to the DSI Community. Job postings must indicate a form of payment. Postings that do not include compensation must explicitly indicate that it does not in the Job title posting. Reply to jobs through DMs. Job posters: make sure to enable DMs from this server. Posts that are not a job posting will be removed. Posts must be in English.
Please wait at least two weeks before re-posting.

DIY Jaad 2019-01-23 01:10

01:11
when i was finishing up my schooling at ITT for autoCAD (design and drafting) i re-made my resume
01:13
i scored about a dozen interviews and got a job from the job faire at itt. however my resume was easy to read, to the point and got the prospective employer right into the meat of the position (roles, responsibilities and pay). when i make a resume it does half the interview for me. however those dozen interviews never panned out cause i was requesting pay that was too high for an entry level drafter
01:14
(its hard to find work as an entry level drafter when you have less than 2 years experience, yet have the capabilities of a senior drafter whos been doing it for 10+ years)
01:15
ideally what you're looking for is a resume template that only needs minor polishing per the job its going out to. static resumes rarely work for the avg person due to different jobs having different requirements thus requiring tweaks to each copy to gel with the role in question

Here, you will be talking to our VP of Engineering and the Founder/CTO.
